tasks.title: Pre-Deployment Verification and Build Testing
tasks.description: Verify the Vite/React application builds successfully and all critical functionality works before deployment
tasks.details: Run 'npm run build' to verify clean build. Test all pages render correctly, verify GHL iframe forms function, check image loading, test mobile responsiveness on key pages. Validate React Router v6 navigation works properly. Check Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui styling renders correctly. Test Calendly modals and Google Maps embed functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute build command and verify no errors. Manual testing of all pages, forms, and interactive elements. Cross-browser testing on Chrome, Firefox, Safari. Mobile testing on various viewport sizes.

subtasks.title: Build Verification and Environment Setup
subtasks.description: Verify the Vite/React application builds successfully without errors and validate build output
subtasks.details: Execute 'npm run build' command to verify clean build process. Check for TypeScript compilation errors, dependency conflicts, and build warnings. Validate that all assets are properly generated in the 'dist' directory. Verify build size optimization and ensure no critical files are missing from the output.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run build command and analyze console output for errors. Check dist folder contents and file sizes. Validate that all required assets (JS, CSS, images) are present and properly optimized.

subtasks.title: Functional Testing and Component Validation
subtasks.description: Test all pages, forms, and interactive components to ensure proper functionality
subtasks.details: Test all pages render correctly with proper content and styling. Verify GHL iframe forms function properly with form submissions. Check image loading across all pages. Validate React Router v6 navigation works correctly between all routes. Test Calendly modals open and function properly. Verify Google Maps embed loads and displays correctly. Check newsletter subscription modal functionality.
subtasks.testStrategy: Manual testing of all pages and interactive elements. Test form submissions end-to-end. Verify all modals and embedded content work as expected. Check console for JavaScript errors during navigation and interactions.

subtasks.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility Testing
subtasks.description: Validate application functionality across different browsers and ensure consistent behavior
subtasks.details: Test the application on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers. Verify Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components render consistently across browsers. Check that all interactive elements (forms, modals, navigation) work properly in each browser. Validate that React 18 features and modern JavaScript work correctly across browser versions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Systematic testing across major browsers. Document any browser-specific issues or inconsistencies. Test both desktop and browser mobile views. Verify polyfills work correctly for older browser versions if needed.

subtasks.title: Mobile Responsiveness and Performance Testing
subtasks.description: Verify mobile responsiveness and performance across different device sizes and orientations
subtasks.details: Test mobile responsiveness on key pages using various viewport sizes (320px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px). Verify touch interactions work properly on mobile devices. Check that all content is accessible and readable on small screens. Test performance metrics including page load times, Core Web Vitals, and mobile-specific optimizations. Validate that modals and forms work correctly on touch devices.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use browser developer tools to test various device sizes. Run Lighthouse mobile audits targeting Performance > 90. Test actual mobile devices if available. Verify touch gestures and mobile-specific interactions work correctly.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down this task into specific testing phases: build verification, functional testing, cross-browser testing, and mobile responsiveness testing. Each subtask should focus on a specific aspect of the pre-deployment verification process.

Verify all navigation elements, form submissions, and interactive components work correctly across both platforms. Test performance impact of integration and ensure Core Web Vitals remain optimal.
subtasks.testStrategy: End-to-end user journey testing from React to WordPress and back. Performance testing with Lighthouse audits. Cross-browser and cross-device compatibility testing of integrated solution.

subtasks.title: SEO Validation and Final Optimization
subtasks.description: Validate SEO implementation with Rank Math and optimize complete integrated solution performance
subtasks.details: Verify Rank Math SEO plugin shows green scores across all WordPress blog pages. Test XML sitemap generation includes both React and WordPress content. Validate meta tags, structured data, and SEO optimization across integrated solution. Perform final performance optimization and ensure page load times remain under 3 seconds for complete user journey.
subtasks.testStrategy: SEO audit using Rank Math plugin validation. Performance testing with GTmetrix and PageSpeed Insights for complete integrated solution. Verify XML sitemaps and structured data implementation.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Divide into React site blog link updates, navigation integration, external link handling implementation, visual transition optimization, comprehensive integration testing, and SEO validation. Each subtask should focus on a specific integration aspect.
